amendatorysection.catchline: Field sampling and testing; expense of owner; no state-funded indemnity.
amendatorysection.para: Field sampling and testing required by the provisions of the Nebraska Poultry Disease Control Act and the rules and regulations duly promulgated under the provisions of the act, and the costs of maintaining quarantined poultry shall be at the expense of the owner. No state-funded indemnity shall be paid to owners of pullorum-or typhoid-infected flocks slaughtered or disposed of in any manner. No state-funded indemnity shall be paid to owners of poultry flocks infected with avian influenza that are slaughtered or disposed of in any manner.
